Metadata.Title: Proof of Concept
Metadata.Description:
Kronstadt's Concept 5 is, despite its sleek design, a wholly unremarkable gun. Colonel Ted Mendez wasted a lot of his budget outfitting his troops with it, and his superiors were furious. They tasked us with the following objectives:- Ruin Mendez's reputation by impersonating him.- Prove the Concept 5's not entirely unreliable by eliminating the people involved in its development with it.- Steal an expensive Kronstadt helicopter (one of the clients is apparently an helicopter collector, and wants to recoup the losses somehow).Good luck, 47.

Exit: Helicopter
<HCCE>
